name: iHOME  iBT60 Rechargeable Rubberized Bluetooth Mini Speaker

reviews.name: iHome iBT60 Bluetooth Mini Speaker, Purple
reviews.reviewText: This speaker has fantastic sound for something so little! We bought two for our daughter. They came charged. One speaker has adequate volume for a 12' x 15' room. It took a minute or two for Bluetooth to sync up between her cell phone and the speaker, but it worked fine and played with her cell 25' away. (The instructions say it has a 30' Bluetooth range.) She wasn't able to sync both speakers to her phone at once (only one at a time works with Bluetooth). She hasn't tried linking the two via a cable. There is no volume control on the speaker, but that isn't an issue for our daughter. I researched a lot of these portable speakers and believe we got our money's worth paying regular price although it would have been even nicer to get them on sale.
reviews.title: A lot of sound for little a speaker

reviews.name: iHome iBT60 Bluetooth Mini Speaker, Purple
reviews.reviewText: For only having 1 speaker this little thing gets loud. Holds a charge ror a looooong time.
reviews.title: awesome sound for 1 speaker

reviews.name: iHome iBT60 Bluetooth Mini Speaker, Purple
reviews.reviewText: My only question is why I cannot play "shuffle" on my iPod when I connect to this speaker? I don't have a problem with shuffle when I connect headphones to my iPod, but for some odd reason I cannot shuffle when connected to this speaker. Not sure it's the speaker or user!
reviews.title: Just what I wanted!

reviews.name: iHome iBT60 Bluetooth Mini Speaker, Purple
reviews.reviewText:
This little speaker is awesome! I am so shocked the sound that comes out of this!
For 30.00 it is a great buy. I got purple because it was the only one my Walmart had left, but
it supposedly comes in other colors.
reviews.title: IBT60 mini Bluetooth speaker

reviews.name: iHome iBT60 Bluetooth Mini Speaker, Purple
reviews.reviewText: The speake is great i love it can't wait to get my mom one
reviews.title: satisfied customer
